column1: FAN, MAN, CHN, CXN	"Basic “meaningful speech” (near and clear speech) categories used by LENA for further processing: Female Adult Near
column3: Key Child Near and Other Child Near categories respectively."

column1: NON, TVN, OLN, SIL	"Basic non-speech categories: Noise Near
FAF, MAF, etc.	“Far” (low probability) versions of each category.
AWC	Adult Word Count (estimated within FAN and MAN vocalizations)
AVA	A measure of vocal maturity processed over VOC
CTC	Conversational Turn Count (estimated over FAN/MAN and CHN turns)
